entry.title: Why do I keep this site?
entry.summary: Having had a web site for about 15 years, I start to wonder why I keep it in the first place.

div.p: I took this image 8 April. I took another earlier February
Ludvig Holberg in Bergen. The statue is situated on the main square in down-town Bergen, a wonderful city built by a Norwegian fjord beneath some very Norwegian mountains.
I wanted Ludwig, the square and the mountain on the same image. Ludvig isn't as sharp has he could be. Sorry for that.

Ludvig Holberg was born here, but his academic career is connected to the university of Copenhagen. The University of Bergen and Det Danske Sprog- og Litteraturselskab are now producing a new critical edition of Holbergs collected work. Uni Digital delivers the technology and then will we, The Royal Library, Copenhagen together with the University of Bergen Library share the burden of hosting the system.
